column4: hi guys I'm running ubuntu 10.04 I'm new to linux and want to learn bash this is my second day using IRC
Is their way to surf anonymously?
How do I use a proxy?
how will I go about setting one up
Thre are anonymous proxy servers some of which are free, you'd have to pay for others which offer proxy and high bandwidth.
is their a way you can show me how?
samair.ru lists a few proxy servers. I'd warn you that their speed is very slow.
pick something from their proxy server list. USually they mention their uptime and country. it is better to choose any county other than usa.
their has to be a way your using a proxy for free
i did use a few proxy servers there sometime ago. Some of the servers which aer free are fast. you'd have to try a few.
you can use some proxy servers to appear as if you are in another coutry :)
i'm trying a socks server on my irc client
